title: Joel Kim Booster | Republicans, Losing Impeachment Fight, Call Democrats "Dumb": A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans standing by President Trump even after a major election loss and a bombshell testimony.

Then, Seth talks to actor and comedian Joel Kim Booster, who also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night's Henry Melcher.
